home.hero.label: Software Consultant
home.hero.lead: 20 years of engineering excellence. Helping teams write maintainable code, embrace agile practices, and amplify productivity with the right blend of human expertise and AI tooling.
home.stats.years.label: Years of Experience
home.stats.quality.label: Focus on Quality
home.stats.learning.label: Continuous Learning
home.expertise.heading: Expertise that drives results
home.expertise.1.title: Clean Architecture
home.expertise.1.description: Building systems that are maintainable, scalable, and a joy to work with. Code that stands the test of time through proper design principles and patterns.
home.expertise.2.title: Team Acceleration
home.expertise.2.description: Unlocking team potential through authentic agile practices, transparent communication, and identifying bottlenecks with Theory of Constraints.
home.expertise.3.title: AI Integration
home.expertise.3.description: Leveraging AI tools strategically to amplify developer productivity without compromising code quality or team autonomy.
home.expertise.4.title: TypeScript Excellence
home.expertise.4.description: Deep expertise in modern TypeScript, serverless architectures, Web Components, REST, and GraphQL for robust full-stack solutions.
home.expertise.5.title: Quality Systems
home.expertise.5.description: Implementing quality management practices that catch issues early, reduce technical debt, and maintain high standards sustainably.
home.expertise.6.title: Cloud Native
home.expertise.6.description: Building and deploying scalable cloud solutions with modern DevOps practices, Kubernetes, and infrastructure as code.
home.philosophy.heading: Philosophy
home.philosophy.p1: Software development is a human endeavor. The best technical solutions emerge from teams that communicate transparently, share knowledge freely, and maintain a genuine agile mindset.
home.philosophy.p2: After two decades in this field, I've learned that sustainable productivity comes from investing in quality upfront, not rushing to meet arbitrary deadlines. Clean code isn't a luxury—it's the foundation of every successful project.
home.philosophy.p3: AI is transforming our industry, but it's a tool, not a replacement. The real value comes from experienced engineers who know when to leverage automation and when human judgment is irreplaceable.
home.philosophy.quote: "Every project has its unique challenges. I love analyzing them from a cross-functional perspective to expand my horizon and pass knowledge to aspiring and seasoned developers alike."
home.philosophy.quote.author: — Martin Trenker
home.cta.heading: Ready to elevate your team's productivity?
home.cta.lead: Let's discuss how clean code practices and strategic AI integration can transform your engineering organization.
me.img.alt: Profile picture of Martin Trenker, consultant and web developer
me.title: Martin Trenker
me.subtitle: Consultant, Web Developer
me.about.heading: About me
me.about.p1: My passion for web development started in the 90s when free web hosting became popular. I became active in the community, helping aspiring developers with HTML, CSS, PHP, MySQL, and JS.
me.about.p2: Today, I love building things in the cloud and creating user-oriented, interactive experiences while spreading awareness for clean code and authentic agile practices.
me.contact.heading: Contact
me.skills.heading: Skills
me.skills.programming.heading: Programming
me.skills.org.heading: Organizational
me.section.cleanAgile.heading: Clean and Agile
me.section.cleanAgile.p: I am privileged to have worked with many bright minds over the years and want to share my experience with my clients. With a better understanding of quality management, agile best practices, and a human-centric approach, we can build better products and create a healthier work environment for everyone.
me.section.learner.heading: Learner and Mentor
me.section.learner.p: Every project has its unique challenges. I love analyzing and understanding them from a cross-functional perspective to expand my horizon and, on the way, pass some of it to aspiring and seasoned developers alike.
me.section.automation.heading: Automation
me.section.automation.p: As an automation nerd, I can help identify and implement automation of repetitive tasks that waste time and energy teams could use for new features instead.
